name: Fantasy Mosaics 18: Explore New Colors
description: Uncle Aaron and the mysterious lady penguin go on a vacation trip to explore new colors for mosaic puzzles! Along the way they make new discoveries and build a fantasy landscape! Enjoy this installment of fantasy mosaics that also includes a new feature allowing you to view the background art with a puzzle image in progress.
minimum_requirements: OS: XP,Vista,7,8,10 Processor: 1.6 Ghz Memory: 1 GB RAM DirectX: Version 8.0 Storage: 110 MB available space
